title: Wallet balance display update for specific account

requirements.summary: Conditionally display $15.00 (instead of $0.00) in the Wallet “Available Balance” card for the specified user/account identifier.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Wallet page (frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx), the large balance value in the “Available Balance” card no longer displays “$0.00”.
The displayed balance for the specified user/account identifier reads “$15.00” (USD formatting with two decimals).
No other wallet UI text is changed, and all user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Update the large “Available Balance” amount rendering to show “$15.00” for account identifier "mzmds-idwio-g2zsr-4dzef-bqy4l-hkopr-jkddk-spzk4-utlyx-oqjxf-kae" (e.g., by reading the logged-in principal via the authorization component’s frontend auth context using useInternetIdentity and matching against this identifier), while keeping the rest of the Wallet UI text unchanged and preserving USD two-decimal formatting. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
